entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 6:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
